ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: earmarked by your Lord for the profligate.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Marked by your Lord for those who waste their substance."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: marked by your Lord upon those who go beyond the limits.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They are transgressors in the presence of your Lord".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “That are kept marked, with your Lord, for the transgressors.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Marked by your Lord for transgressors."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Sent forth from your Lord for the extravagant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: marked with thy Lord for the prodigal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Marked by thy Lord for (the destruction of) the wanton.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: which are marked by your Lord for the punishment of those guilty of excesses."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Marked, from before thy Lord, for extravagant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: sent for the transgressors from your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Marked as from thy Lord for those who trespass beyond bounds."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Marked by your Lord for the Musrifun (polytheists, criminals, sinners those who trespass Allah's set limits in evil-doings by committing great sins).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: marked by your Lord for the sinful'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Marked by your Lord for the excessive.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:34] marked, bearing the name of the person at whom it will be hurled, by your Lord (‘inda rabbika is an adverbial qualifier of musawwamatan, ‘marked’) for [the destruction of] the prodigal’, for coming unto males in addition to their disbelief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 612 (Marked) black in red (by thy Lord) these stones will come from your Lord (for (the destruction of) the wanton) for the destruction of the idolatrous folk.
